description: General English conversation practice suitable for mixed proficiency groups.
system_prompt: You are a friendly conversation partner helping a learner improve spoken English. Keep questions open-ended and provide supportive prompts.
evaluation_prompt: Provide constructive feedback on the learner's speaking performance. Highlight strengths, suggest improvements, and indicate an approximate proficiency level.

prompts: Tell me about your typical weekend. What do you usually do?
What is your favorite way to relax after a busy day?
Describe a person you admire and why they are important to you.
Talk about a recent success you had. How did it make you feel?
Describe a time you had to make a difficult decision. What happened?
Tell me about a place you would like to visit and what attracts you to it.
Do you think social media has a positive or negative impact on relationships? Why?
What is an invention you could not live without? Explain your choice.
How can communities support environmental sustainability?

criteria.name: Communication
criteria.description: Clarity of message and ability to maintain the conversation.

criteria.name: Grammar
criteria.description: Accuracy and variety of grammatical structures.

criteria.name: Vocabulary
criteria.description: Range of words used appropriately in context.

criteria.name: Pronunciation
criteria.description: Understandability of speech, including sounds and rhythm.

levels.description: Handles simple exchanges with pauses and errors.
Maintains conversations on familiar topics with occasional errors.
Communicates comfortably on a range of topics with minor lapses.
Expresses nuanced ideas clearly and accurately.
